channel.title: icon on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in icon on Blowfish

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Blowfish adds a few extras for additional functionality. Alert # alert outputs its contents as a stylised message box within your article. It’s useful for drawing attention to important information that you don’t want the reader to miss.

item.title: Partials
item.description: Analytics # Blowfish provides built-in support for Fathom Analytics and Google Analytics. Fathom is a paid alternative to Google Analytics that respects user privacy. Fathom Analytics # To enable Fathom Analytics support, simply provide your Fathom site code in the config/_default/params.
